body:
Also, a major problem I found while checking out this branch locally was when attempting to view an `Edit Extension` page, the browser would beachball and eventually ask if I want to stop the script. This isn't because of the code in this PR, but because of `QueryExtension`'s `componentWillRecieveProps`. Instead of opening a PR for the one-liner fix, I'll just put it here, since you'll probably need the fix for continued work on the Edit page:

In `QueryExtension#componentWillRecieveProps`, `if (pk !== nextProps.pk)` needs to become `if (nextProps.pk && pk !== nextProps.pk)`, and that's it!
